tag_list: community, niche, tag, review, write, rate, submit, share, discover, business, consumer, b2b, b2c
overview:
Austen Mayor is the Founder and President of SocioCentral Online Inc.

His first IT job was in mid-2004, selling what was then state of the art web-conferencing technology and he’s been hooked ever since. Austen holds a BA in Communications. His wide range of experience comes from completing database analyst, marketing, graphic design and website management contracts, but before starting SocioCentral, Mr. Mayor was a Communications Advisor.

Austen Mayor has always been fascinated by the way technology and culture affect each other. This long-time interest is what led him to build his company SocioCentral Online Inc.

Austen has created an unprecedented and comprehensive Consulting Program, optimizing every branch of a company for social media, increasing revenue, employee engagement, loyal/potential customers, all while providing valuable public relations and online marketing advice.

Independent members of SocioCentral discover specific communities that match their interests by rating, reviewing, tagging, favoriting and sharing social websites. Members can also submit communities to the SC database.

external_links.title: Austen's first real world experience in the IT field
